channel.title: Go on Adam Israel
channel.description: Recent content in Go on Adam Israel

item.title: Making OS X, Go, and Brew play happy
item.description: GO and OS X I’m doing a little hacking with juju actions before they land in a stable release but I ran into some hurdles getting Go working with the brew-installed version. Trying to install Go packages failed with a bunch of ‘unrecognized import path’ errors. Here’s how I fixed it. STOP, GO, STOP Even though you can install Go via brew, there’s more to be done to get it working.
